Playground Upgrade At Maunder Reserve

Location: Guildford, Australia
Date: 2/9/2024
Application: playground

Project Overview

In the residential suburb of Guildford, just west of Sydney central business district, the local community is enjoying the recent upgrades at Maunder Reserve.The new softfall surface features rich blends of Rosehill TPV® red and orange rubber, along with new playground equipment, and is designed to improve safety and cushion children from common playground mishaps.Rosehill TPV® is a unique surfacing material that is suitable for a range of applications including playgrounds, indoor spaces, sport venues and more. Its durability against Australia’s intense climate and UV exposure ensures long-lasting colour and texture retention, making it a favoured choice nationwide.Thanks to Pty Ltd and
